plot: The year is 2093 where if someone is recently deceased they can be converted into a robotic android. In this we follow a character called Harrison who is dragged into a computer room and secrets begin to share out.
title: Resident
plot_es: The year is 2093 where if someone is recently deceased they can be converted into a robotic android. In this we follow a character called Harrison who is dragged into a computer room and secrets begin to share out.
plot_en: The year is 2093 where if someone is recently deceased they can be converted into a robotic android. In this we follow a character called Harrison who is dragged into a computer room and secrets begin to share out.
